name: biggety
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaving in an unpleasant way that shows you think you are more important than you really are: Since you're such a biggety know-it-all, why don't you tell us how this thing works? He's acting awfully biggety for someone who only just started working here a month ago. Synonym
uppity
More examplesFewer examplesDon't waste your time hanging around such biggety folks who only look down on you.You talk as though you're all biggety but we all know you're no better or wiser than the rest of us.
